vote.text: Amendment SA 1587 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1587 proposed by Senator Cornyn for Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR S2464; text: CR S2464) To improve the bill.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1587 proposed by Senator Cornyn for Senator Grassley.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1587 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
